body_html:
@zou3519 pytorch, with python setup.py install
Finally I succeed. There are two things I got.
1, git clone -recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
2, Update the CUDA to 9.0 and flow the cmd in the README.md
Here is the discuss

body:
@zou3519 pytorch, with python setup.py install
Finally I succeed. There are two things I got.
1, git clone -**recursive** https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
2, **Update** the CUDA to 9.0 and flow the cmd in the README.md
Here is the [discuss ](https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/installation-problems-with-pytorch-0-5-0/19099/4)
